'''''Vinyar Tengwar 43''''' is the forty-third issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|42|44}}

==Contents==
* E.L.F. News

* "'Words of Joy': Five Catholic Prayers in Quenya, Part one"✫ — J.R.R. Tolkien, eds. Patrick H. Wynne, Arden R. Smith, and Carl F. Hostetter
** 1. ''[[Átaremma]] (Pater Noster)''
** 2. ''[[Aia María]] (Ave Maria)''
** 3. ''[[Alcar i Ataren]] (Gloria Patri)''

<small>✫ contains formerly unpublished material</small>
